title: Wilbur Ross: Trump's cabinet member appears to sleep through president's UN speech
text:
One of Donald Trump's cabinet members appeared to fall asleep during his speech to the United Nations.

As Mr Trump railed against Iran and globalists, commerce secretary Wilbur Ross was seen with his eyes shut. Many on social media claimed he had fallen fast asleep.

“We want partners, not adversaries,” Mr Trump said in an address before world leaders at the United Nations General Assembly.
